html: All in same week: Aaron Donald became highest-paid defensive player in NFL history. Aaron Rodgers became highest-paid player in NFL history. And OBJ became highest-paid WR in NFL history.
text:
All in same week:

Aaron Donald became highest-paid defensive player in NFL history.

Aaron Rodgers became highest-paid player in NFL history.

And OBJ became highest-paid WR in NFL history.

html: Even with the record-breaking deal, Aaron Donald’s salary-cap number for the 2018 season rises from $6.892 million to $8.892 million. Rams get their man without suffocating impact to their salary cap this season.
text: Even with the record-breaking deal, Aaron Donald’s salary-cap number for the 2018 season rises from $6.892 million to $8.892 million. Rams get their man without suffocating impact to their salary cap this season.

html: Long time coming: Rams and Aaron Donald finalizing a record 6-year, $135 million, including $87 million guaranteed, per source. Richest defensive deal in NFL history. Donald now tied to LA for next seven years. And he will be ready for Monday night opener vs. Raiders.
text:
Long time coming: Rams and Aaron Donald finalizing a record 6-year, $135 million, including $87 million guaranteed, per source. Richest defensive deal in NFL history.

Donald now tied to LA for next seven years. And he will be ready for Monday night opener vs. Raiders.

html: Over next two days, 1,184 NFL players will be fired from their jobs. Some will return to practice squads, but many will have no choice but to move on. There is no busier transactional time in the NFL than this weekend. For many it is a brutal weekend they won’t forget.
text:
Over next two days, 1,184 NFL players will be fired from their jobs. Some will return to practice squads, but many will have no choice but to move on.

There is no busier transactional time in the NFL than this weekend. For many it is a brutal weekend they won’t forget.

html: The Dallas Cowboys have agreed to trade undrafted rookie cornerback Charvarius Ward to the Kansas City Chiefs, sources told @AdamSchefter and me. It is expected to be finalized Friday.
text: The Dallas Cowboys have agreed to trade undrafted rookie cornerback Charvarius Ward to the Kansas City Chiefs, sources told @AdamSchefter and me. It is expected to be finalized Friday.

html: Source: the Patriots and TE Dwayne Allen have agreed to reworked contract, reducing his compensation for 2018. Allen was previously due $4.5M with a $5M cap number, which will now be lowered.
text: Source: the Patriots and TE Dwayne Allen have agreed to reworked contract, reducing his compensation for 2018. Allen was previously due $4.5M with a $5M cap number, which will now be lowered.

html: Rob Gronkowski now can earn $1.1 million for 70 or more catches, $1.1M for 80 percent playtime, $1.1M for nine or more TD catches, $1.1M for 1,085 receiving yards. He can make three of those four, boosting salary another $3.3M. Base salary remains 8M. Still has two years left.
text: Rob Gronkowski now can earn $1.1 million for 70 or more catches, $1.1M for 80 percent playtime, $1.1M for nine or more TD catches, $1.1M for 1,085 receiving yards. He can make three of those four, boosting salary another $3.3M. Base salary remains 8M. Still has two years left.

html: Patriots reworked TE Rob Gronkowski’s contract, adding $4.3 million to his contract this year, per @RosenhausSports Added $1 million in per game bonuses and $3.3 million in incentives, boosting max value to $13.050 million. Similar to Tom Brady structure.pic.twitter.com/XYy6xIg5Iu
text:
Patriots reworked TE Rob Gronkowski’s contract, adding $4.3 million to his contract this year, per @RosenhausSports 
Added $1 million in per game bonuses and $3.3 million in incentives, boosting max value to $13.050 million. Similar to Tom Brady structure.pic.twitter.com/XYy6xIg5Iu

html: The new @PodcastOne “Eyes On Sports” features great friend @AdamSchefter whose new book “The Man I Never Met: A Memoir” is remarkable. html: Jets informed Teddy Bridgewater that he was being traded to New Orleans this afternoon, before the team left for Thursday’s preseason finale in Philadelphia; Bridgewater then stepped on to the Jets’ bus to say goodbye to his summer teammates.

html: Compensation update on Jets-Saints trade: New York is sending QB Teddy Bridgewater and a sixth-round pick to New Orleans for a third-round pick, per sources.
text: Compensation update on Jets-Saints trade: New York is sending QB Teddy Bridgewater and a sixth-round pick to New Orleans for a third-round pick, per sources.

html: Trade of Teddy Bridgewater to the Saints is expected to involve draft picks. And with Bridgewater headed to Saints, Sam Darnold now looks to be Jets opening-night starter.

And with Bridgewater headed to Saints, Sam Darnold now looks to be Jets opening-night starter.

html: Record extension for Packers, Aaron Rodgers includes $103 million guaranteed and could reach $180 million total, per sources:https://es.pn/2MCvyx6
text: Record extension for Packers, Aaron Rodgers includes $103 million guaranteed and could reach $180 million total, per sources:https://es.pn/2MCvyx6

html: Packers’ QB Aaron Rodgers is signing his four-year, $134 million extension “in a few minutes,” per source.
text: Packers’ QB Aaron Rodgers is signing his four-year, $134 million extension “in a few minutes,” per source.

html: Aaron Rodgers new deal with the Packers will be worth $176 million to $180 million total, per source. Big feature is cash flow: $67m before end of calendar, over $80m before St. Patrick’s Day next year, $103m practically guaranteed, per source.
text: Aaron Rodgers new deal with the Packers will be worth $176 million to $180 million total, per source. Big feature is cash flow: $67m before end of calendar, over $80m before St. Patrick’s Day next year, $103m practically guaranteed, per source.

html: Aaron Rodgers new deal with the Packers will be with $176m-180m total, per source. Big feature is cash flow: $67m before end of calendar, over $80m before St. Patrick’s Day next year, $103m practically guaranteed, per source.

html: Aaron Rodgers’ new deal is expected to be the largest in NFL history and will tie him to Green Bay for well beyond the two years on his contract and quite likely for the remainder of his career.
text: Aaron Rodgers’ new deal is expected to be the largest in NFL history and will tie him to Green Bay for well beyond the two years on his contract and quite likely for the remainder of his career.

html: Packers and Aaron Rodgers are expected to complete their record-breaking extension by the end of the weekend, source tells ESPN. But the deal is expected to now be finalized and in place before the start of the regular season, per source.
text: Packers and Aaron Rodgers are expected to complete their record-breaking extension by the end of the weekend, source tells ESPN. But the deal is expected to now be finalized and in place before the start of the regular season, per source.

html: Raiders have donated $250,000 to save Oakland youth sports that were eliminated by the Oakland Unified School District due to budget constraints. Raiders will allocate funds through East Bay Community Foundation. (http://www.ebcf.org ). Donation will be coordinated w/ O.A.L.
text: Raiders have donated $250,000 to save Oakland youth sports that were eliminated by the Oakland Unified School District due to budget constraints. Raiders will allocate funds through East Bay Community Foundation. (http://www.ebcf.org ).  Donation will be coordinated w/ O.A.L.

html: LB Mychal Kendricks addressing the Browns on tonight’s Hard Knocks: “Playing with Nick Foles, I realized on his long balls he has like a tear-drop effect. So (CBS), he’s a little slower on that ball coming in.” “No. 86 is the best receiver on the team. Notice I say receiver...”
text:
LB Mychal Kendricks addressing the Browns on tonight’s Hard Knocks:

“Playing with Nick Foles, I realized on his long balls he has like a tear-drop effect. So (CBS), he’s a little slower on that ball coming in.”

“No. 86 is the best receiver on the team. Notice I say receiver...”

html: Steelers are freeing up over $2 million in salary-cap space by converting about $3 million of TE Vance McDonald’s base salary into signing bonus for this season, per league source. More flexibility for Steelers.
text: Steelers are freeing up over $2 million in salary-cap space by converting about $3 million of TE Vance McDonald’s base salary into signing bonus for this season, per league source. More flexibility for Steelers.

html: Teams are watching Baltimore’s kicker situation closely to see what Ravens do with undrafted free agent Kaare Vedvik, a kicker and punter who has impressed at camp. Vedvik has been more impressive than Will Lutz was with Ravens last summer, before he landed a job with Saints.
text: Teams are watching Baltimore’s kicker situation closely to see what Ravens do with undrafted free agent Kaare Vedvik, a kicker and punter who has impressed at camp. Vedvik has been more impressive than Will Lutz was with Ravens last summer, before he landed a job with Saints.

html: Odell Beckham’s new 5-year, $95 million deal that includes $65 million guaranteed eclipses Steelers WR Antonio Brown’s $17 million per year average and tops Buccaneers WR Mike Evans’ $55 million in total guarantees.
text: Odell Beckham’s new 5-year, $95 million deal that includes $65 million guaranteed eclipses Steelers WR Antonio Brown’s $17 million per year average and tops Buccaneers WR Mike Evans’ $55 million in total guarantees.

html: Breaking: #Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr has now agreed to a 5-year extension that makes him the highest paid WR in the NFL on a $95M max deal, $65M total guaranteed.
text: Breaking: #Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr has now agreed to a 5-year extension that makes him the highest paid WR in the NFL on a $95M max deal, $65M total guaranteed.

html: Jaguars’ WR Marqise Lee is being placed on injured reserve today. He suffered knee ligament damage Saturday night vs Atlanta on a hit that some believe is related to NFL’s rules changes. Lee’s season is over.
text: Jaguars’ WR Marqise Lee is being placed on injured reserve today. He suffered knee ligament damage Saturday night vs Atlanta on a hit that some believe is related to NFL’s rules changes. Lee’s season is over.
